item.title: Dow closes above 50,000 for first time to wrap rough week for U.S. stock market
item.description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average surged more than 1,200 points Friday, leading a broader stock-market rebound.

item.title: Tesla’s stock rallies to recover some of its losses this week
item.description: The company is making inroads on two potential growth segments: driverless cars and solar energy.

item.title: This little-noticed bond-market development could put many borrowers on edge

item.title: After bitcoin’s fall, pity those wildly enthusiastic investors who borrowed billions against crypto
item.description: The speculation that bitcoin would hit $200,000 in 2025 now seems like a dream. Because it was.
